ComicInfo.Summary:
Our second Highlander storyline concludes here in issue #9 of Dynamite's Highlander series!
Connor and Duncan face off for what may be the very last time at the Highlander struggles with the evil infestation of the Kurgan's Dark Quickening! All the immortal action and excitement from Jerwa and artist Fabio Laguna along with cover artists David Michael Beck, Michael Avon Oeming, Dave Dorman and Pat Lee!
